actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to provide that under certain circumstances exclusive territorial arrangements relating to the manufacture, sale, or distribution of soft drink products are not unlawful.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Trade Commission Act to permit, under specified circumstances, exclusive territorial arrangements made as part of a licensing agreement for the manufacture, distribution or sale of a trademarked soft drink product.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to provide that under certain circumstances exclusive territorial arrangements relating to the manufacture, sale, or distribution of soft drink products are not unlawful.
